get_widgets_by_project:
SELECT pwidget_id, widget_type, content
    FROM project_widgets
    WHERE project_id = ?
    ORDER BY display_order;
get_task_data_by_project:
SELECT t.pwidget_id, t.title, t.completed, t.body, t.deadline
    FROM project_widgets pw
    LEFT JOIN task_data t ON pw.pwidget_id = t.pwidget_id
    WHERE pw.project_id = ? AND pw.widget_type = 'Task'
    ORDER BY pw.display_order;
update_pwidget_content_by_id: UPDATE project_widgets SET content = ? WHERE pwidget_id = ?
insert_into_project_widgets: INSERT INTO project_widgets (project_id, widget_type, content) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
rename_project_by_id: UPDATE projects SET title = ? WHERE project_id = ?
update_project_description: UPDATE projects SET description = ? WHERE project_id = ?
update_project_deadline: UPDATE projects SET deadline = ? WHERE project_id = ?
update_task_completed: UPDATE task_data SET completed = ? WHERE pwidget_id = ?
update_title_in_task_data: UPDATE task_data SET title = ? WHERE pwidget_id = ?
update_body_in_task_data: UPDATE task_data SET body = ? WHERE pwidget_id = ?
update_deadline_in_task_data: UPDATE task_data SET deadline = ? WHERE pwidget_id = ?
